articles.title: A new name at sea: CFARER launches as an independent maritime software brand
articles.author: system
articles.summary: CFARER, a new brand derived from DNV Maritime, officially launched yesterday. This represents a new product or service offering under a new brand identity.

articles.title: 23 Hair Products With Amazing Before And After Photos
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of hair products from different companies. These products include Revlon hot air brush, Moroccanoil treatment for hair, Olaplex pre-shampoo treatment, L'Oreal Paris rinse-out lamellar water treatment, Verb weightless hair oil, and Color Wow moisture-repelling spray, each offering unique benefits such as styling, repair, hydration, and frizz control.

articles.title: Tech review: Dangbei N2 Mini projector is small, yet mighty
articles.author: Jim Rossman
articles.summary: Dangbei has launched the N2 Mini projector, an affordable option priced at $199. The N2 Mini features 1080P resolution, built-in Wi-Fi with pre-installed streaming apps, and a unique gimbal stand for easy setup. It is designed for use in darkened rooms and is suitable for bedroom viewing or outdoor movie nights.

articles.title: Savor CEO sees less agriculture in food's future
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A company is preparing to launch a new type of butter. This butter is unique because it is made without the use of either plants or animals.

articles.title: Dreame Technology Unleashes Eleven Smart Home Breakthroughs, Ushering in a New Era of Intelligent Living in the U.S.
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Dreame Technology is launching a new lineup of AI-powered cleaning solutions and next-gen personal care tools. This launch signifies the company's ambition to lead the smart home living sector and its North American expansion.

articles.title: "Yerba Madre's 'Eco Sneakers Are a Scam': Dirt Shoes Campaign Divides America as Wildflower Seeds Leave Streets a Mess
articles.author: Eirwen Williams
articles.summary: Yerba Madre, formerly Guayaki, launched 'Dirt Shoes,' biodegradable sneakers made from organic materials that release wildflower seeds as they disintegrate. The Dirt Shoes symbolize the company's commitment to eco-friendly practices and environmental stewardship, marking a significant rebrand and a move towards eco-conscious marketing.

articles.title: LaunchMyStore Surpasses 10,000 Registered Users, Reinforcing Its Role as a Global eCommerce Enablement Platform
articles.summary: LaunchMyStore, a no-code eCommerce platform, has reached 10,000 registered users. The platform is expanding its feature set with upcoming releases including AI-assisted content generation, SEO tools, multilingual store support, and multi-currency checkouts. The platform enables users to create an eCommerce website without coding.

articles.title: Buckle up. AI is ready to help you edit photos
articles.author: Amy Iverson
articles.summary: Google Photos is introducing new AI-powered features, including 'Photo-to-video' conversion, AI-assisted photo editing with text prompts, 'Remix' to transform pictures into different art styles, a more specific 'Ask Photos' search function, and QR code sharing for albums. The 'Remix' feature is rolling out in the next few weeks.

articles.title: The initial reactions to OpenAI's landmark open source gpt-oss models are highly varied and mixed
articles.summary: OpenAI released two new open-source language models, gpt-oss, under the Apache 2.0 license. The models, designed for different hardware configurations, have received mixed reviews, with some praising their efficiency and others criticizing their narrow usefulness and performance compared to other open-source models.  Benchmarks place the models ahead of most American open-source offerings but still falls short of Chinese heavyweights like DeepSeek R1 and Qwen3 235B.

articles.title: Dreame Technology Unleashes Eleven Smart Home Breakthroughs, Ushering in a New Era of Intelligent Living in the U.S.
articles.author: Dreame Technology
articles.summary: Dreame introduced a new lineup of AI-powered cleaning solutions and next-gen personal care tools. This introduction marks a significant step in Dreame's North American expansion.

articles.title: A Portland waterfront institution is back open with a new menu and old name
articles.author: Aaron Tanguay
articles.summary: Dry Dock restaurant has reopened under new management with Matt Ginn as the general manager. The restaurant is introducing a new dish, Tuna Crudo, featuring bluefin tuna, avocado, and jalapeno citronette.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a $1,200 Lenovo IdeaPad laptop for just $270, and it's 'ideal for students'
articles.author: Rebecca Rovenstine
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 78% discount on the Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 Chromebook, bringing the price down to $270 from its original $1,200. This Chromebook features 8-core performance, a high-definition display, and up to 10 hours of battery life, making it suitable for work, school, or on-the-go use.

articles.title: Yfood review: I tried the complete meal drink that claims to keep you full for hours
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Yfood is introducing ready-to-drink meals as a convenient and healthy meal replacement option. These drinks, available in various flavors like banana, contain essential vitamins, minerals, protein, fats, carbohydrates, and dietary fibers, aiming to provide a balanced diet for busy individuals. Yfood is available from the Yfood site and also in single bottles at Tesco, Sainsbury's and Morrisons.

articles.title: Einstein Bros. Bagels coming to League City in 2026
articles.author: Rachel Leland
articles.summary: Einstein Bros. Bagels will open a new location in League City in the first quarter of 2026. This expansion represents a new service offering from the company in that area.

articles.title: This iconic Nike running shoe from the '90s is making a comeback with its boldest look ever
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Nike is relaunching the Air Zoom Spiridon on August 7th at 10 a.m. ET for $190. The shoe, initially released in 1997, features a Hot Fuchsia and Black design, reflective piping, airy mesh, and full-length Air Zoom cushioning.

articles.title: Tullamore D. E. W. Launches Nationwide Search for South Africa's Next Changemakers
articles.summary: Tullamore D.E.W., an Irish whiskey brand, is launching the "Tully Squad Search" until September 2025 to find 10 individuals to join their movement. The search aims to identify real people with influence, fostering connection and representing a cultural shift for the brand.

articles.title: Heinz's new ketchup smoothie slammed as ‘nasty' with fans outraged by unusual flavour combo
articles.author: Georgia Campbell
articles.summary: Heinz has launched a ketchup smoothie in collaboration with Smoothie King, blending tomato ketchup with fruits and sorbet. Additionally, Heinz introduced "Tomato Ketchup Zero", a new ketchup variant with no added sugar and salt, boasting a different color and health benefits. The new products aim to meet consumer trends for healthier food choices.

articles.title: Heinz's new ketchup smoothie slammed as ‘nasty' with fans outraged by unusual flavour combo
articles.author: Georgia Campbell
articles.summary: Heinz has launched a ketchup smoothie in collaboration with Smoothie King, featuring a blend of ketchup, acai sorbet, apple juice, strawberries, and raspberries and is available at Smoothie King stores in the US. Heinz also introduced "Tomato Ketchup Zero," a new ketchup variant with more tomatoes, no added sugar and salt, and health benefits which customers found to taste better than other zero products.

articles.title: A new Apple TV 4K is still coming this year, says report – but of ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Apple is introducing a new Apple TV. The update is not expected to be game-changing.

articles.title: Yelp Launches Local Co-Branded Showcase Ads
articles.author: Mark Mwachiro
articles.summary: Yelp launched Local Co-Branded Showcase Ads, a new ad unit that allows national brands to showcase their small business partners to Yelp's audience. Pepsi and Bilt piloted the ads; Pepsi used them to co-brand with local restaurants, and Bilt drove over 300,000 restaurant visits and increased business page views for showcased restaurants.

articles.title: Best Home Security Cameras Without Subscriptions in 2025: Save on Safety
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: The Tapo C120 Indoor/Outdoor Cam is presented as a top choice for a home security camera due to its high resolution and ability to operate without a monthly subscription. It offers local storage options, eliminating the need for cloud storage fees.

articles.title: The foot peel mask that has all of TikTok raving about the 'GROSSLY satisfying' results is on sale for under £16 at Amazon
articles.author: EMILY SCRIVENER
articles.summary: Plantifique Foot Peel Mask, containing lactic and salicylic acid, is now on sale on Amazon. The mask exfoliates dry, dead skin from feet, leaving skin soft. Sales have soared with over 4,000 sold in the last month.

articles.title: 34 TikTok-Famous Beauty Products It's Officially Time For You To Try
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond launched a firming neck and chest cream formulated with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Eos introduced a limited edition Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment. Clinique released Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. E.l.f unveiled Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara using lightweight tubing technology.

articles.title: Aurora Mobile's GPTBots.ai to Integrate Claude Opus 4.1 to Advance Intelligent Agent Capabilities  Aug. 6, 2025 17:00
articles.summary: Aurora Mobile plans to integrate Claude Opus 4.1 into its GPTBots.ai platform to improve the performance of AI agents when handling complex tasks. This upgrade is expected to enhance development efficiency and user experience by leveraging improvements in programming, research, and data analysis capabilities.

articles.title: Amazon uses Lada to promote new auto service
articles.summary: Amazon utilizes a Lada in its promotional campaign. This campaign promotes Amazon's new auto service.

articles.title: SHARP Unveils the AQUOS R10 Smartphone with AI-Powered Features and Dolby Atmos® Stereo Sound  Aug. 6, 2025 16:30
articles.summary: SHARP is launching its new AQUOS R10 smartphone in Singapore on August 6, 2025. The AQUOS R10 features a Pro IGZO OLED display with a peak brightness of 3,000 nits, a new image sensor, and generative AI capabilities for call support and note-taking.

articles.title: Tyson 2.0 Announces 'Pocket Pigeon' Live Resin Vapes Now Landing in New York State
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Tyson 2.0 has launched its new 'Pocket Pigeon' live resin vape line in New York State. The 'Pocket Pigeon' offers 0.15g of high-quality live resin in a discreet, all-in-one vape device designed to preserve the full spectrum of natural terpenes and cannabinoids, providing a premium experience at an entry-level price point.

articles.title: Daryl-Ann Denner, the $100 Million T-Shirt Queen
articles.author: best women-owned products
articles.summary: Daryl-Ann Denner launched Nuuds in October 2022, a clothing brand focused on providing high-quality basics designed with community feedback. The initial launch of six hero styles sold out in seven minutes, highlighting the brand's early success and the demand for its products.

articles.title: The Hyperlocal Advantage: Understanding your Place in AI Search
articles.author: Sean Whitehead
articles.summary: Sorbet partnered with Sauce and Yext to enhance its local presence in South Africa, resulting in a 36% increase in unbranded visibility and a 19% rise in store clicks. This collaboration demonstrates the effectiveness of managing local presence through SEO and digital location management.

articles.title: Delivering Growth: How Maltazon and Booze Wagon Are Redefining E-commerce With Wo
articles.author: Lovin Malta
articles.summary: Maltazon, initially a B2B tech service, pivoted to consumer essentials delivery using Wolt during the pandemic and now offers over 4,000 products, while Booze Wagon, launched in 2019, utilizes Wolt to provide fast alcohol delivery, becoming a late-night favorite. Both companies have integrated with Wolt to streamline operations and enhance the customer experience, aiming to expand their offerings and reach.

articles.title: Sainsbury's makes major change to shopping as supermarket introduces Tesco Clubcard style savings
articles.author: JANE DENTON
articles.summary: Sainsbury's has expanded its 'Your Nectar Prices' program, allowing Nectar card holders to access personalized discounts at checkouts. Shoppers can unlock up to 10 weekly discounts on regularly purchased or recommended items through the Nectar app or website, with potential savings exceeding £150 annually.

articles.title: Wonder food hall opening second Staten Island location this week: Here's what you need to know
articles.author: Pamela Silvestri
articles.summary: Wonder is opening a new location in New Dorp, Staten Island, featuring a food hall concept with over 20 restaurant brands. The location offers delivery to seven Staten Island ZIP codes and ordering will be available via wonder.com. The new location's opening includes a 'Friends and Family' preview event before the official grand opening.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Aug 6, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: Pringles introduced Miller Lite-flavored chips, and Tyson launched high-protein nuggets. Listerine released a limited edition Watermelon Mint mouthwash. Other new products include Bloom Crisp Apple Sparkling Energy, Command Limited Edition Color Collection Wire Hooks, CoverGirl Lash Blast Bond Mascara, Welch's Juicefuls Fusions, Lunchables Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich, Celsius Fizz-Free Pink Lemonade & Dragonfruit Lime, and e.l.f. SKIN Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Moisturizer Drops.

articles.title: MTN introduces Zigi,new digital online assistant
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: MTN Nigeria is launching 'Zigi,' an online assistant chatbot. Zigi is designed to enhance customers' digital interactions with the brand and provide marketing, sales, and technical support. Customers can interact with Zigi on various platforms, including WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, the MTN website, and the myMTN App.

articles.title: Simba Hybrid Essential mattress review: essential by name, not by nature
articles.author: Aaron Dowler
articles.summary: Simba has introduced the Hybrid Essential mattress, a budget-friendly option in their range, priced from £499. It is designed for back sleepers, couples, and hot sleepers, offering a medium-firm feel with cooling technology. It's available for purchase directly from Simba and other retailers.

articles.title: Where to Buy the 'Oat' and 'Black' Nike Air Max 1000s
articles.summary: Nike is releasing new "Oat" and "Black" colorways of its 3D-printed Air Max 1000 on August 19th. The "Oat" colorway will be released on SNKRS, while the "Black" pair will arrive at Zellerfeld.com. The sneaker, produced with Zellerfeld, features a one-piece upper and Nike's visible Air technology.

articles.title: How to make tuna mayo taste better with 1 simple ingredient chefs love
articles.author: Angela Patrone
articles.summary: The author experimented with albacore tuna in olive oil as a substitute for John West Tuna Chunks in spring water for making tuna mayo. The author noted that the albacore tuna had a milder flavor and firmer texture than the usual tuna, enhancing the tuna mayo by allowing other ingredients to be more distinct.

articles.title: Splash In's Largest Tunnel Car Wash Now Open In Leonardtown
articles.author: Jessica Jennings
articles.summary: Splash In has launched a new car wash facility in Leonardtown, Maryland, featuring a 110-foot tunnel capable of washing 110 vehicles per hour and 20 free vacuum bays. Splash In offers membership packages for unlimited washes, including Basic, Boost, and Best levels.

articles.title: Own Your Spotlight with OPPO Reno14 Series
articles.author: Sania Saeed
articles.summary: OPPO has launched its Reno14 series smartphones in Pakistan, featuring AI-powered photography, an Iridescent Mermaid Design, and advanced AI features. The series includes Reno14 F 5G, Reno14 5G, and Reno14 Pro 5G, with Reno14 5G featuring the MediaTek Dimensity 8350, 6,000mAh battery and 45W SUPERVOOC™ fast charging. The OPPO Reno14 Series is now available for Pre-order through official OPPO retailers and OPPO online stores with exclusive offers.

articles.title: Aldi launches five viral food items that everyone's talking about
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: Aldi has launched five new food and drink products, inspired by viral trends on TikTok. The new products include Dubai Chocolate Style Mochi, Specially Selected Pistachio Creme, Gianni's Pistachio Chocsticks, Matcha Latte, and Pistachio & Raspberry Chouxnuts, with prices starting from £1.49.

articles.title: Not One, But 100: Manus's Wide Research Is a Direct Hit on the AI Elite
articles.summary: Manus launched Wide Research on July 31, 2025, a new tool enabling users to execute over 100 AI agents simultaneously for tasks like product analysis and report generation. Manus demonstrated that Wide Research could compare 100 sneaker styles in parallel and produce 50 graphic poster designs in less than five minutes.

articles.title: Watch: What happens when you fold Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 over 200,000 times?
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, its newest foldable flagship phone. The new phone features an improved hinge design that is rated for up to 500,000 folds, making it the company's most durable foldable yet.

articles.title: Beijing robot store stocks Einstein replicas, chess partners, in AI leadership push
articles.author: Che Pan
articles.summary: A new store in Beijing is opening to sell humanoid and consumer-oriented robots from over 40 Chinese brands like Ubtech Robotics and Unitree Robotics. The store offers sales, spare parts, maintenance, and survey services for robots ranging from 2,000 yuan to several million yuan, marking the introduction of a new retail service for these products.

articles.title: Search.Com Revolutionizes AI Chat: Introducing a Game Changing Approach Benefiting Consumers, ...
articles.author: Search.com
articles.summary: Public Good's division, Search.com, launched a new AI-powered search platform featuring cashback opportunities for consumers and revenue sharing for publishers. This platform provides free access to knowledge and allows users to earn rewards from premium brands through a subscription membership program, offering 10% cashback on purchases.

articles.title: Search.Com Revolutionizes AI Chat: Introducing a Game Changing Approach Benefiting Consumers, Publishers and Brands
articles.author: Search.com
articles.summary: Public Good's division, Search.com, launched a new AI GPT chat platform featuring cashback opportunities for consumers and revenue share for publishers. The platform offers equitable access to knowledge, discounts from brands, and a clutter-free advertising environment, accessible via desktop and mobile devices.

articles.title: '단체로 이상 증세, 1명은 사망'… 강릉 병원서 ‘허리 시술' 받은 환자들, 무슨 일?
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: New stylish mobility scooters are available for seniors. These scooters are marketed through search ads.

articles.title: Hello AI! Please translate this for me
articles.author: Toshiro Agarwal
articles.summary: Studio Blo projects the global market for AI-driven language tools to cross $20 billion by 2030. Mouthshut.com uses AI-powered voice translators to understand and communicate with people. Galleri5 uses AI tools to tag and categorise content in many Indian languages to help creators get discovered.

articles.title: Alibaba unveils new open source AI that creates images with perfect text
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Alibaba unveiled a new open-source AI. This AI is capable of generating images with perfect text, indicating a new product launch in the AI domain.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works Launches in Over 600 College Campuses Nationwide
articles.author: Bath
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is launching its products in over 600 college campus stores nationwide, marking its first large-scale distribution outside of its own retail locations. The curated assortment caters to Gen Z and includes top-selling fragrances like Champagne Toast and Warm Vanilla Sugar, available in various product forms such as body care, hand soap, and candles.

articles.title: You've Probably Never Heard Of This $10 Dry Shampoo That Reviewers Say ‘Works Almost Too Well'
articles.author: Tessa Flores
articles.summary: Nuva Botanicals has launched a dry shampoo, priced at $10, that utilizes a sponge applicator and natural corn starch formula.  Customers claim it effectively absorbs oil, adds volume, and extends time between washes, with some preferring it over Living Proof's Perfect Hair Day dry shampoo. The aerosol-free product is travel-friendly and leaves no residue.

articles.title: The Painful Reality Behind Most Product Launches
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: Nkanyezi Naturals, a skincare brand, faced numerous challenges during its launch, including regulatory compliance issues, packaging problems, and lack of consumer testing, resulting in unsold inventory. Just Design offers services to guide brands through the entire product launch process, from ideation to consumer validation, to avoid costly mistakes and ensure a successful launch.

articles.title: BYD's cheapest electric crossover hits the market
articles.author: Radoslav Slavchev
articles.summary: BYD has launched a new, cheaper base version of its electric crossover, the Yuan UP, priced at $10,400. This model offers a range of up to 300 km and includes features like a digital instrument cluster and a 14.1-inch touchscreen. The Yuan UP is aimed to make electric cars accessible, balancing price and functionality.

articles.title: Best 2025 student bundle deals to get freshers uni-ready in one click
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: UniKitOut offers specialized student starter kits starting at £169. Dunelm provides budget-friendly student starter packs from £4, while Wilko features student essentials with up to 40% off. HelloFresh provides meal kits for students, with prices as low as £2.62 per portion.

articles.title: Best 2025 student bundle deals to get freshers uni-ready in one click
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: UniKitOut offers specialized student starter kits from £169, while Dunelm provides budget-friendly student starter packs starting from £4. Wilko has student essentials with up to 40% off selected lines and student discounts, and Matalan offers a Uni collection from £2 with potential savings on bedding, kitchenware, and clothing. HelloFresh provides student-friendly meal kits with prices as low as £2.62 per portion.

articles.title: Panda Express x Buldak Preview Night
articles.author: 부동산 인사이트
articles.summary: Panda Express introduces Dynamite Sweet & Sour Chicken, a collaboration with Buldak, featuring crispy chicken and a fiery sauce. This limited-time offering is the spiciest menu item from Panda Express and is available in select markets.

articles.title: Luxury Jeweler, Chow Sang Sang, Selects Nuvei to Power Online Payments and Accelerate Global Expansion
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
org: Chow Sang Sang Holdings International Lim
articles.summary: Nuvei announced that Chow Sang Sang Holdings International Ltd. has joined its growing roster of merchants. This signifies a service expansion for Nuvei, allowing Chow Sang Sang to potentially scale globally through their platform.

articles.title: What Is a Minimum Viable Product?
articles.author: Brett Surbey
articles.summary: The article presents the concept of a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) and how companies like Dropbox, Spotify, Buffer, Zappos, Oculus Rift, and Slack have utilized MVPs. It provides examples of MVP formats, such as core feature prototypes, promotional landing pages, and short concept videos, to validate product ideas and collect customer feedback before a full launch. This approach helps companies minimize risk and optimize resource allocation during the introduction of new products or services.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 50s Pro Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Motorola officially announced the Motorola Edge 50s Pro in the third quarter of 2024. This 5G smartphone features a Li-Po 4500 mAh battery with 125W wired and 50W wireless charging and is equipped with a 50-megapixel main camera and a 50-megapixel front camera.

articles.title: You can get a DreamCloud mattress for $649 ahead of Labor Day
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering up to 60% off select mattresses ahead of Labor Day 2025, including the queen-size hybrid for $649. Customers can also upgrade a child's twin bed starting at $399 or get bedding bundles from $179 with a mattress purchase. DreamCloud provides a 365-night home trial and lifetime warranty.

articles.title: Milkmaid's new ad serves up the ‘yummazing' joy of homemade desserts
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Nestlé Milkmaid launched a new TVC to promote preparing desserts at home with loved ones. The campaign highlights the rich and creamy experience Milkmaid brings to sweet creations and also showcases Milkmaid's new reusable pack designed for everyday convenience.

articles.title: Mi Sedaap Launches Refreshed Packaging for Original Fried Noodles Across U.S. Retail Channels
articles.summary: Mi Sedaap has launched a redesigned packaging for its Original Fried Noodles (Mi Goreng) in the U.S. market through Jans Enterprises Corp. The updated packaging aims to enhance shelf visibility, global appeal, and consumer convenience while maintaining the same iconic flavor. It is now available in the U.S. through various retail and online channels.

articles.title: GCash vows to roll out new features to promote responsible online gaming
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: GCash is introducing new features to its platform.

articles.title: Check Features, Specs, Colours & More
articles.author: Asianet Newsable English
articles.summary: Honda has launched the latest version of its X-ADV adventure scooter in the global market. The new edition features styling and color updates while retaining the same powertrain.

articles.title: Danny Dyer ‘a tosser' as Deliveroo launches freshness promise
articles.author: George Nott
articles.summary: Deliveroo has launched a 'freshness promise' service, refunding customers for supermarket grocery orders with fewer than three days until expiry from participating supermarkets like Sainsbury's, Co-op, Morrisons, Iceland and Asda. Additionally, Deliveroo introduced 'Fridge Filler Mondays,' offering half-price discounts on fresh and chilled items.

articles.title: Alibaba unveils new open source AI that creates images with perfect text
articles.summary: Alibaba has launched Qwen-Image, a new open-source image generation model. This model excels in rendering complex and multilingual text within images. The model supports both alphabetic and logographic scripts, making it useful in multilingual contexts and is available for commercial use under the Apache 2.0 license.

articles.title: Newborn Town Issues Positive Profit Alert for First-Half 2025: Adjusted Operating Profit Surpasses RMB 600 Million, while the Profit Attributable to the Company's Equity Shareholders Increases over 108% YoY
articles.author: PRNEWSWIRE
articles.summary: Newborn Town's revenue growth is driven by the expansion of social networking products like MICO, YoHo, SUGO, and TopTop. The company is also developing two new social networking products expected to generate over USD 10 million in monthly recharge revenue within three years. Additionally, Newborn Town's quality games segment, including Alice's Dream: Merge Games, has entered a profit-generating phase.

articles.title: CIBC Innovation Banking Provides $7.5M of Growth Capital to SmartSkin Technologies Inc.
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SmartSkin Technologies is expanding its market reach by leveraging a $7.5M growth capital facility from CIBC Innovation Banking. SmartSkin provides manufacturing intelligence solutions using pressure-sensitive sensors and AI-driven analytics, empowering pharmaceutical and beverage producers to optimize efficiency, ensure quality, and eliminate costly production issues.

articles.title: Bolt Graphics claims 13x leap over Nvidia RTX 5090 with less wattage
articles.author: Daniel Sims
articles.summary: Bolt Graphics is introducing its new Zeus architecture with planned GPUs, claiming superior performance compared to Nvidia's RTX series while consuming less power. The Zeus lineup includes models such as the Zeus 1c-032, 2c-064, 2c-128, and 4c-256, with specifications that aim to outperform existing high-end GPUs.

articles.title: You should skip the new Kindle Colorsoft for this reason alone
articles.author: Eli Becht
articles.summary: Amazon launched a new Colorsoft Kindle model, offering it at a $30 discount compared to its older counterpart. This cheaper model features 16GB of storage and lacks wireless charging, which are significant limitations for comic and manga readers who require more storage. Despite the lower price, the trade-offs may not justify the cost savings for many users.

articles.title: Jasprit Bumrah fronts launch of HUL's Surf Excel Matic Express
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Hindustan Unilever (HUL) has launched Surf Excel Matic Express, a new detergent formulated using robotics and AI for quick 15-minute cycles. It aims to meet current consumer needs for speed and efficiency. The product is available in two variants and can be purchased across South India and online.

articles.title: SamBlogs Becomes the First SEO Agency to Help Clients Rank in Perplexity, Gemini, ChatGPT, and Beyond
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: SamBlogs launched Generative Engine Optimization (GEO), a new service to enhance business visibility across AI platforms such as Perplexity, ChatGPT, and Gemini. This service strategically places brands within AI content ecosystems, ensuring they appear in AI citations and answer boxes, marking a shift towards optimizing for the engines of the future.

articles.title: This New Swiffer Sweeper Replaced 2 of My Cleaning Tools
articles.author: Maggie Horton
articles.summary: Swiffer has launched a new and improved Sweep and Mop Deluxe Cleaning Kit, available on Amazon for under $25. The updated kit includes a sweeper, dry cloths, and wet mopping cloths, featuring a collapsible pole, locking head, and reinforced pole for better scrubbing power. The new mopping pads also include a textured strip providing 75% more scrubbing power.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Grok can now create ‘spicy' NSFW adult content for ₹700 a month
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: xAI launched Grok Imagine Mode, which is available to SuperGrok and Premium Plus X subscribers on iOS. The new feature includes a 'Spicy Mode' that is generating attention for its ability to generate NSFW content.

articles.title: Robi launches 4G Cloud Phone with one-touch access
articles.summary: Salextra Limited has launched the Xtra R24, Bangladesh's first key-enabled 4G cloud feature phone, priced at BDT 2,499 and offering up to 2GB of storage. The phone features dedicated shortcut buttons for popular social media platforms and exclusive data bundles for Robi customers. It will also come with a 100-day replacement guarantee and a one-year after-sales service.

articles.title: Galaxy S21 Price Shock As Samsung's Note Cancellation Revealed
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S21 features a new price point. Samsung might discontinue the Galaxy Note range.

articles.title: Hyundai Motor Group Reveals New Dedicated EV Platform
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Hyundai Ioniq and Kia Niro utilize a platform specifically designed for their purpose.

articles.title: Empty space 'now something a little special' as it makes promise to city
articles.author: Paul McAuley
articles.summary: New CourtYard, a bar and creative space, has opened in Liverpool, offering food, live music, and free WiFi. XF Gym is set to launch a 30,000 sq ft gym in the autumn of 2025, featuring training facilities, wellness spaces, and various fitness classes.

articles.title: You won't believe what you can now buy on Amazon
articles.author: Emilyann Jackman
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Amazon Autos, a new service for buying used and certified pre-owned vehicles. Initially available in Los Angeles and partnering with Hyundai dealers, Amazon Autos offers transparent pricing, a 3-day/300-mile return policy, and a limited warranty. The company plans to expand the service to other cities and partner with more dealerships.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's latest business hiccup as fans fail to rush to buy her new wine
articles.author: Hanisha Sethi
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's brand, As Ever, launched a 2024 vintage of Napa Valley rosé wine on August 5th, available in batches of three, six, and twelve, priced at £66, £116, and £218 respectively. The new wine has an ABV of 13.5% and is described as 'thoughtfully curated by Meghan, Duchess of Sussex'.

articles.title: Elon Musk's Grok can now create ‘spicy' NSFW adult content for ₹700 a month
articles.summary: xAI recently released Grok Imagine Mode, including a new 'Spicy Mode' that generates explicit content and is available to SuperGrok and Premium Plus X subscribers on iOS. The usage of Grok Imagine is growing rapidly, with millions of images generated within days of its launch.

articles.title: 34 Cheaper Options For Anyone Who Refuses To Buy Trendy Name-Brand Products This Summer
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder for eliminating shine and blurring pores. E.l.f. launched Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen with SPF 35, acting as a blurring primer. Neutrogena offers Ultra-Sheer Face Serum with SPF 60 in a travel-size bottle.

articles.title: Lotte Duty Free expands premium line-up with baby products, beauty devices, and unique foods
articles.author: DFNI Staff
articles.summary: Lotte Duty Free has expanded its product line with premium baby gear from Bugaboo, offering strollers and other baby products. They have also secured exclusive rights to sell Botem beauty devices known for skin-firming benefits. Additionally, Lotte Duty Free's Busan branch opened a K-Speciality Shop, featuring brands like Yiayia and Friends and Praebee, offering unique food items and supporting local businesses.

articles.title: Motorola G96 Review: Good Design and Clean Android Experience Under Rs 20,000
articles.summary: Motorola introduces the Moto G96, a new addition to its G series, featuring a sleek design with a Pantone-validated vegan leather back and a curved 6.67-inch pOLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate. Powered by the Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset, it offers a near-stock Android 14 experience and a 50MP main camera, aiming for a balanced daily user experience.

articles.title: SHARP Unveils the AQUOS R10 Smartphone with AI-Powered Features and Dolby Atmos® Stereo Sound
articles.summary: SHARP is launching the AQUOS R10 smartphone in Singapore on August 6, 2025. The AQUOS R10 features generative AI, peak display brightness of 3,000 nits and powerful stereo speakers to provide cinematic-quality visuals and studio-grade audio.

articles.title: LG launches Fourth Free Wash Centre in Benin City
articles.author: Etuka Sunday
articles.summary: LG Electronics opened a free laundry center with the capacity to wash and dry about 500 sets of clothes. This initiative aims to give back to the community by providing a state-of-the-art hygienic laundry service.

articles.title: Forget DJI – Zero Zero Robotics' upcoming lightweight drone is "100% waterproof" with a Level 7 wind resistance
articles.author: Matt Kollat
articles.summary: Zero Zero Robotics has launched the HoverAir Aqua, the first waterproof drone that can be launched from the water. The drone features a hydrophobic coating, titanium components and can shoot 4K videos at 100fps. It boasts level 7 wind resistance and is colored orange for better visibility.

articles.title: moto g86 POWER a Perfect All-Rounder Goes on Sale Today Featuring Segment's Brightest 1.5K pOLED Display 50MP OIS Sony LYT-600 Camera 6720mAh Battery and IP68 69 Durability with MTK Dimensity 7400 at
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the moto g86 POWER, a new smartphone featuring a 6.67' 1.5K pOLED display, a 50MP OIS Sony LYTIA 600 camera, and a 6720mAh battery. The phone is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset and is available for purchase on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores, starting at Rs. 16,999 with available bank discounts and offers.

articles.title: Google creating new opportunities with AI in Action
articles.author: Faizel Patel
articles.summary: Google has introduced NotebookLM in local South African languages, isiZulu and Afrikaans, which is an AI-powered research and summarization tool. They also launched SynthID Detector, a tool for identifying content watermarked with SynthID, promoting transparency. Additionally, IDInsight, with support from Google.org, unveiled 'Ask-A-Question', a natural language chatbot on the MomConnect platform, delivering essential health information.

articles.title: moto g86 POWER a Goes on Sale Today with Segment's Brightest 1.5K pOLED Display, 50MP OIS Sony LYT-600 Camera, 6720mAh Battery for Rs. 16,999*
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola launched the moto g86 POWER, a new smartphone featuring a 6.67" 1.5K pOLED display, 50MP OIS Sony LYTIA camera, and a 6720mAh battery. The phone is powered by MediaTek Dimensity 7400 and comes with 8GB RAM and 128GB storage, available on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores at an effective price of Rs. 16,999.

articles.title: moto g86 POWER a Perfect All-Rounder Goes on Sale Today Featuring Segment's Brightest 1.5K pOLED Display, 50MP OIS Sony LYT-600 Camera, 6720mAh Battery, and IP68/69 Durability with MTK Dimensity 7400 at an Incredible Price of Just Rs. 16,999*
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Motorola launched the moto g86 POWER smartphone, featuring a 6.67' 1.5K pOLED display, a 50MP OIS Sony LYTIA 600 main camera, and a 6720mAh battery. It is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 processor, with 8GB RAM and 128GB storage, and is available on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores starting August 6th, 2025, priced at Rs. 16,999.

articles.title: Lenovo Launches Modular DaaS for Sustainability to Manage Carbon, Reduce IT Costs, and Boost ROI
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Lenovo introduced TruScale Device as a Service (DaaS) for Sustainability. This modular solution helps enterprises advance sustainability goals.

articles.title: Smart. Fast. Precise: Compact and affordable PIXMA printers designed to fit your life
articles.summary: Canon introduced two new ultra-compact 3-in-1 PIXMA printers, the TS6540i and TS4140i, designed for speed and smartphone connectivity. The new printers feature fast print speeds, borderless photo printing, and seamless wireless printing and scanning capabilities via the Canon PRINT app. The printers are intended for home and small office use.

articles.title: Aldi's £11 cleaning gadget is a must-have for parents with muddy shoes & boots – it will save you hours of scrubbing
articles.author: Joshua Rom
articles.summary: Aldi is selling a new product called 'The Boot Buddy,' a cleaning gadget for muddy shoes and boots. The product is priced at £11.49 and is available both online and in-store. The Boot Buddy features a tough scraper, strong bristles, and a 300ml water capacity.

articles.title: If You Want A Cool Upgrade, Try These 33 Smarter Versions Of Common Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new products and services.  E.l.f. launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, while Oxo introduced the compact Brew Rapid Brewer.  Ninja released the portable Crispi Air Fryer system.

articles.title: Rolls-Royce's new Ghost: Still plenty posh, but more laid back
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Rolls-Royce introduced the new Ghost, a car designed for buyers seeking a more conventional automobile compared to the Phantom sedan. This new model aims to offer a different experience within the ultra-luxury automaker's range.

articles.title: GACB Sathorn Experience Center & GAC Thailand Battery Service Center Officially Open  Aug. 6, 2025 06:03
articles.summary: GAC launched the GACB Sathorn Experience Center and GAC Thailand Battery Service Center in Bangkok, marking its first flagship store in Southeast Asia. Simultaneously, GAC introduced the upgraded AION UT electric vehicle in Thailand, which already has secured 4,500 orders. These launches represent GAC's expansion strategy and its move towards a full-industry-chain ecosystem in the region.

articles.title: MCE Introduces AI entrepreneur Alon Gilady as New Chief Operations Officer
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: MCE Systems' dDLM platform leverages AI technology for features like Agentic AI for personalization, empowering mobile operators to personalize digital customer interactions and create more valuable customer experiences. MCE also offers a cosmetic grading solution that allows customers to remotely assess their device's objective value and execute trade-ins or purchase insurance outside of the initial 30 days without visiting a store.

articles.title: We've been on the hunt for a pink midi dress for months, and M&S has delivered!
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) is preparing to launch its Pink Midi Dress online, priced at £45. The dress, already available in select stores, features a boat neck, short sleeves, and a floaty midi skirt with a belted waist. M&S also offers other pink dress options like the Pure Cotton Pintuck Midi Tiered Dress and the Textured Strappy Midi Cami Relaxed Dress.

articles.title: That was fast: The new Ford Territory is coming sooner than you think
articles.summary: Ford will launch the heavily updated version of the Ford Territory on August 8, 2025. The new crossover features a Ranger-like front end with a slimmer grille and new bumpers. The interior receives minor revisions, while powertrain options include a 1.5-liter EcoBoost engine and a plug-in hybrid.

articles.title: Lotte Duty Free (CEO Kim Dong-ha) announced on the 6th that it has further strengthened the attracti..
articles.author: Park Yoon Kyun
org: Busan K Special Products Editing Shop
articles.summary: Lotte Duty Free has introduced several new brands and products. Lotte Internet Duty Free launched 'Bugaboo', a Dutch premium childcare brand, and Lotte Duty Free's Busan branch introduced 'YIAYIA AND FRIENDS', a premium food brand, and 'Praebee', a honey brand, along with a pop-up store featuring local Busan souvenirs.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Zionsville plans budget adjustments amid new tax laws
articles.author: Patch AM Team
org: Zionsville Department of Parks and Recreation
articles.summary: T-Mobile invested billions to improve its network, earning the title of America's best mobile network in the US, according to Ookla Speedtest. They are also supporting communities like Zionsville to keep them connected.

articles.title: 有望三季度正式上市 五菱缤果S官图发布_手机网易网
articles.author: 车质网
articles.summary: Wuling has officially released images of its new pure electric small SUV, the Wuling Bingo S. The vehicle features a closed front grille with LED headlights, a through-type taillight, and is available in colors like Relaxed Gray, Free Blue, Carefree Purple and Blank White. It is equipped with a 75 kW single motor and a lithium iron phosphate battery pack, and is scheduled to launch in the third quarter of this year.

articles.title: With Google's People Cards, you can search and find yourself on Google without a website
articles.author: Tech City
articles.summary: Google introduced People Cards, a new mobile-only feature on Google Search. People Cards enable users to create a personal presence in the form of a card, similar to a Google Search Knowledge Panel. This card includes details users want to share with others.

articles.title: Leveraging Chinese Advertising to Empower Small Businesses
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Baidu SEM allows bidding on keywords similar to Google Ads to appear at the top of Baidu search results. Platforms like WeChat, Douyin, Sina Weibo, Kuaishou, and Little Red Book are used for marketing and advertising. Amazon has invested in 46 new renewable energy projects and solidified its position as the top corporate buyer of renewable energy in the European market.

articles.title: Khairul Aming Drops New Nyet Product, Only Allows FPX For Payments
articles.author: Shahril Bahrom
articles.summary: Khairul Aming has launched a new product, Rendang Nyet Berapi, and is offering a giveaway to the first five customers who purchase five packets. The prize is an all-expenses-paid trip to New Zealand with Khairul Aming, including a plus one. The product will be available for purchase on Friday, August 8th, exclusively through FPX Online Banking.

articles.title: Colgate-Palmolive unveils refreshed corporate identity
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Colgate-Palmolive has introduced a refreshed corporate brand identity, including a new logo and tagline, to reinforce its commitment to innovation and healthier futures. The updated logo retains elements from the original while incorporating new features and a color palette optimized for digital platforms. The new brand identity has already been implemented on the company's US corporate website and global social media channels.

articles.title: Wyze's first smartwatch comes with a nine-day battery life and costs just $20
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Smart home company Wyze has announced its first smartwatch, called Wyze Watch. It is an affordable security camera and smart device.

articles.title: OnePlus 9 and 9 Pro rumours, release date, specs and features
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Rumors have begun regarding future products from OnePlus. These rumors follow the recent announcements of the OnePlus 8T and the OnePlus Nord series, suggesting the company may be planning further product introductions.

articles.title: LiSTNR unlocks real-time ad targeting with launch of Precision Plus
articles.author: Natasha Lee
articles.summary: Southern Cross Austereo (SCA) has launched LiSTNR Precision Plus, a new addition to the LiSTNR AdTech suite. This AI-driven platform enables real-time campaign adjustments based on first-party and advertiser data, allowing for more efficient ad targeting and creative testing.

articles.title: ConverSight Enhances Supply Chain Decision Intelligence with AI Demand Forecasting
articles.author: Conver Sight
articles.summary: Post introduces an AI Demand Forecasting Solution designed to increase supply chain visibility, decision-making, and automation. The solution achieves over 97% accuracy in demand and supply planning forecasts, integrates with over 150 existing systems, and offers quick-start AI with real-time actionable insights.

articles.title: AWS launches preview of its Proton container management service for infrastructure provisioning and code deployment for serverless and container-based apps (Natalie Gagliordi/ZDNet)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: AWS launched a public preview of AWS Proton, a container management service designed for infrastructure provisioning and code deployment for serverless and container-based applications. The company also made other related announcements about its container offerings.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 review: Portability, performance in a trending form factor
articles.author: Tushar Kanwar
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a slim and light foldable phone with a wider outer screen and an 8-inch inner display. It features the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, runs on One UI 8 based on Android 16, and has a 200-megapixel main camera from the S25 Ultra.

articles.title: Xactly Launches AI Agents for Sales Performance Management and Go-to-Market Operations
articles.summary: Xactly launched AI Agents on its Intelligent Revenue Platform. These AI Agents leverage Xactly's data and business logic to help sales teams build applications and extensions via Xactly Extend, automating business processes through an intuitive conversation interface.

articles.title: Good Enough To Eat: What Are Gourmand Scents – And Why Do We Love Them?
articles.author: Ashleigh Cometti
articles.summary: Armani launched Si Passione Red Musk, a sweeter take on the original Si fragrance. Jo Malone London introduced Raspberry Ripple cologne, blending raspberry ripple ice cream notes. YSL unveiled Black Opium Glitter, a shimmering take on Black Opium with marshmallow notes. Ellis Brooklyn launched Guava Granita, designed to capture the essence of a beach club. Marc Jacobs has Daisy Love Eau So Sweet. Burberry has Her Intense, a bolder, sweeter take on the original Burberry Her. Jean Paul Gaultier released Scandal Le Parfum, an intense floral amber fragrance.

articles.title: Celebrity Masterchef star Lisa Snowdon's must-have hair loss serum now has 20% off
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: NIOXIN is promoting their Anti-Hair Loss Serum Hair Growth Serum for Thinning Hair, now available at a discounted price. The leave-in serum aims to reduce breakage and hair fall, with a clinical study showing 93% of participants experiencing improved hair anchorage. The serum contains ingredients like caffeine, lauric acid, and niacinamide to stimulate hair follicles and nourish the scalp.

articles.title: Diva revolutionizes laundry care with all-new Diva Power Pods- Delivering 3 jobs with 1 pod
articles.summary: Hemas Consumer Brands has launched Diva Power Pods, a new laundry detergent pod, in Sri Lanka. The product features a triple-layer system for cleaning, softening, and fragrance. Keells Supermarkets is the exclusive distribution partner for Diva Power Pods.

articles.title: ⚡Elon Musk's xAI Grok Imagine ‘Spicy' Mode Enables NSFW Content
articles.summary: xAI launched Grok Imagine, a new tool for SuperGrok and Premium+ users, which creates images and videos from text prompts. The tool also includes a 'spicy mode' for generating NSFW content and allows users to create short videos from visual inputs.

articles.title: Grok Imagine ‘Spicy' Mode Enables NSFW Content: Elon Musk-Run xAI's New AI Tool Lets Users Create Sexually Explicit Images and Videos
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: xAI, led by Elon Musk, has launched Grok Imagine, a new tool enabling users to generate images and videos from text prompts. Available to SuperGrok and Premium+ subscribers on the X app, Grok Imagine also features a 'spicy mode' for generating sexually explicit content. Users can create images and videos by typing descriptions, uploading pictures, or using voice input, with video styles like Spicy, Custom, Fun, or Normal.

articles.title: PlayStation公式ライセンス商品を揃えた「GRAPHT」ポップアップストアが8月12日よりJR池袋駅にて開催決定
articles.summary: GRA is launching a PlayStation Official Licensed POP UP STORE. This store represents a new retail experience or service associated with the PlayStation brand.

articles.title: 37 Products To Quietly Solve Annoying Body Things
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Burt's Bees introduces a sunburn soother made with aloe and coconut oil. Good Molecules launches Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel to minimize eye puffiness. Olay releases Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide and shea butter. Biofreeze unveils Dry Stick for portable pain relief. First Aid Beauty releases KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant to exfoliate and smooth skin.

articles.title: Vinyl's Share Increases, R&B/Hip-Hop Rises, Taylor Swift's Effect
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Luminate released new products or services at Record Store Day Summer Camp.

articles.title: One Eye on Asia: Sour Bangkok's Damisa Ongsiriwattana and Thamakorn Ruchakityanon
articles.author: Guan Hin Tay
articles.summary: The "Smooth E Babyface" campaign introduced an innovative approach to advertising with a soap opera format. Sabina Braless ads, tapped into cultural values. These campaigns showcase the unique and bold approach to advertising in Thailand.

articles.title: GACB Sathorn and GAC Thailand Battery Center Now Open
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: GAC launched the upgraded global premium compact model AION UT in Thailand, securing over 4,500 orders. Additionally, GAC opened the GACB Sathorn Experience Center and GAC Thailand Battery Service Center in Bangkok, marking its first flagship store in Southeast Asia and implementing a 'Sales + Energy Services' strategy.

articles.title: Hong Kong police to launch ‘super app' with 50 e-services and AI chatbot
articles.author: Lynn Zhang
articles.summary: The Hong Kong Police Force is launching a new 'super app' on Sunday, offering a one-stop platform with about 50 e-services, including six new functions. The updated app includes an AI chatbot named 'Yes Sir' and provides integrated access to various police services and digital platforms like iAM Smart.

articles.title: Replica Cyber Unveils Evolved Platform to Secure Innovation and Accelerate Strategic Growth for Enterprises and Government
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Replica Cyber has announced a major evolution of its Replica platform, transforming how organizations accelerate high-stakes business operations. The updated platform, featuring mobile phone access, integrated business tools, and secure external collaboration capabilities, now delivers instant, isolated workspaces for critical activities beyond security.

articles.title: SCA to offer real-time targeting with ‘world-first' ad-tech
articles.author: Nathan Jolly
articles.summary: Southern Cross Austereo (SCA) has launched Listnr Precision Plus, a new advertising technology that utilizes AI and Listnr's first-party data for real-time ad targeting and campaign optimization. This technology allows brands to dynamically adjust campaign targets based on real-time user data and AI-powered insights, with availability to advertisers starting in October.

articles.title: Walmart makes major store change to attract younger customers
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Walmart launched "Walmart Delivers", a fleet of themed mobile stores. The initiative is designed to engage Gen Z with pop-up retail experiences, giveaways, and photo opportunities at events across the U.S. between August and November 2025.

articles.title: Walmart adds new, mobile store format
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Walmart launched "Walmart Delivers," a fleet of themed mobile stores intended to engage Gen Z. This service will offer pop-up retail experiences, giveaways, and photo opportunities at events throughout the U.S. from August to November 2025.

articles.title: Check out these best AI powered washing machine for efficient laundry care: Top 8 picks from with the latest technology
articles.author: Iqbal
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, IFB, Haier, and Bosch introduced new AI-powered washing machines. These models feature technologies like AI Direct Drive and Ecobubble, offering customized wash cycles and energy efficiency.  The machines incorporate features such as steam cleaning, anti-stain programs, and Wi-Fi connectivity, enhancing performance and user convenience.

articles.title: 11 Helpful Items To Keep Kids Busy On Long Flights
articles.author: Kathleen Shea-Porter
articles.summary: Melissa & Doug offers reusable color-with-water pads, while Amazon provides the Kindle Kids e-Reader, snack spinner and wired headphones. Yoto sells a Mini player for audiobooks and Wikki Stix provides mess-free, wax-covered yarn sticks for creative play.

articles.title: 51 Products That'll Make You Say "Wow"
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article highlights a variety of new products and services, including Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream formulated to hydrate and tighten the skin, SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes designed for long-lasting sweat protection, and Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil known for effectively removing blackheads. It further presents a Bissell multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner.

articles.title: Ayala Land reveals P57-billion project launches in second half of 2025
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Ayala Land Inc. (ALI) is planning to launch new projects valued at P57 billion.

articles.title: SJinn Launches Revolutionary Video Agent, an AI Creative Director for Automated Ad and Story Video Production
articles.author: The Galveston Daily News
articles.summary: SJinn AI launched its offering on August 5, 2025.

articles.title: Wegovy maker Novo Nordisk to reduce costs after $95 billion stock loss
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Novo Nordisk, the maker of Wegovy, will sharpen its commercial strategies. This implies an update in their market approach and possibly product strategies.

articles.title: Seeker review: Solana Mobile heard the critics
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Solana Mobile has released a new phone after its initial phone received negative feedback from a tech reviewer. This launch represents an update or new version of their mobile device offering.

articles.title: LG Brings Affectionate Intelligence to Every Home
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching a new lineup of AI-powered home appliances designed to enhance convenience, efficiency, and everyday comfort. The theme for this product introduction is "Affectionate Intelligence for You."

articles.title: Alibaba debuts loyalty scheme with shopping discounts, hotel perks
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: Alibaba Group's Taobao has launched a new membership system. This system integrates various services from the firm's other apps. The aim is to create synergies.

articles.title: How a ‘vibe working' approach at Genspark tripled ARR growth and supported a barrage of ...
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: Genspark leverages AI-native working to accelerate its operations, enabling the company to release new products and features on an almost weekly basis.

articles.title: Greggs teams up with KFC for 'culinary crossover of the century' - and for some ...
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Greggs and KFC are collaborating to introduce a new menu item. This launch requires immediate attention for those interested in trying the new product.

articles.title: The Honest Company x Babylist celebrate grand opening
articles.summary: The Honest Company and Babylist are partnering to launch a pop-up shop. The shop offers Honest's newest diaper innovations and an immersive Babylist experience for modern parents.
